channel.title: Windows on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Cat Printer BLE
item.description: This is a command line program that provides basic functionality to use one of the most recent models (as of March 2025) of Cat Printers: model MXW01.

item.title: Perfect Dark - Save Editor
item.description: This is a Perfect Dark cross-platform save editor. It is able to edit everything of a save file from both the Nintendo 64 and PC versions of the game.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie - Save Editor
item.description: This is a Banjo-Kazooie cross-platform save editor. It is able to edit mostly everything of a save file from the Nintendo 64 version.

item.title: Super Mario 64 - Save Editor
item.description: This is a Super Mario 64 cross-platform save editor. It is compatible with saves of the Nintendo 64 version and the PC port.

item.title: Stars End
item.description: Stars End is a multiplayer sci-fi survival game set hundreds of years in the future, in a star system colonized by humans escaping their dying home world.

item.title: Mars: Chaos Menace
item.description: We are in the Terraforming age after saving our homeworld, Earth, which was collapsed by radioactive contamination and the depletion of resources.

item.title: Demon's Crystals
item.description: Demon’s Crystals is a frenetic twin stick shooter where you guide the Urican demons through countless hazards in order to restore peace to the world.

item.title: RE GC Background Extractor
item.description: This program can find and extract the room backgrounds from Resident Evil Remake and Resident Evil Zero for GameCube.

item.title: DamageBoy
item.description: DamageBoy is the name of Yet Another™ Experimental GameBoy emulator created for learning purposes.

item.title: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties - PC and ports consoles
item.description: This project is my own implementation of the 1993 PC version of the game Plumbers Don’t Wear Ties written from scratch.

item.title: City Gardener
item.description: This is a small prototype I did in three days for a game jam, the Ludum Dare 42.

item.title: RECV Editor
item.description: Tool to extract and edit texts and other localizable data from Resident Evil: Code Veronica for PlayStation 2, GameCube and Dreamcast.

item.title: Super Mario 64 - PC Port
item.description: I did several contributions for the PC port of Super Mario. The biggest of them was the Direct3D 11 renderer.

item.title: Shenmue II Help Editor
item.description: This tool allows to edit the help screens inside the Shenmue 2’s pause menu.

item.title: Shenmue II MEMOEdit
item.description: This is a tool that allows to edit the contents of the notebook in Shenmue 2, located in the files MEMODATA y MEMOFLG.

item.title: Mario Party Tools
item.description: Mario Party Tools is a simple program that allows you to perform several actions to edit Mario Party data.

item.title: Without Escape
item.description: Without Escape harkens back to first-person graphic adventures of the early ‘90s, which relied on pre-rendered backgrounds and full-motion video to tell interactive stories.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie Editor
item.description: This little program contains some tools to make easier the translation process of Banjo-Kazooie. Note that this is ONLY compatible with the european version of the game.

item.title: AFS Packer
item.description: AFS Packer can extract the files inside an AFS archive to a folder, or generate a new AFS archive from the files located in a folder.
